steps: Define encryption levels in AMCP config: { encryption: { level: 'none'|'secrets-only'|'full', publicCheckpoints: bool } }
Level 'none': Everything plaintext on IPFS (for transparency/research agents)
publicCheckpoints flag: if true, checkpoint CIDs are posted to Solvr for discoverability
Config can be set per-agent in openclaw.json or AMCP config
Verify: publicCheckpoints=true posts CID to Solvr, false does not
